account.title: Account to debit
account.available_accounts: You can't create a transaction in this account either because:<1><0>A transaction is pending and must be processed beforehand.</0><1>The account isn't credited.</1><2>The account is being updated.</2></1>

confirmation.desc: A transaction request will be sent to the members of the account. It will not be broadcasted to the blockchain until it is approved.

nonEIP55Warning: Auto-verification not available: carefully verify the address
parentFeeExceeded: Max operation fee exceeds ETH parent account balance
